changeSet.author: WeiChen
changeSet.sql:
UPDATE nhi_procedure SET description='Dx&Tx plan: Panoramic Finding (00315C)
- Missing:
- Impaction:
- 3rdMolar:
- Crown/Bridge/SSC:
- Pulpitis:
- RR:
- Caries:
- Periodontal status: [ ] Normal, [ ] Gingivitis, [ ] Periodontitis
- Other finding:' where code = '00315C';
            UPDATE nhi_procedure SET description='Dx&Tx plan: Panoramic Finding (00316C)
- Missing:
- Impaction:
- 3rdMolar:
- Crown/Bridge/SSC:
- Pulpitis:
- RR:
- Caries:
- Periodontal status: [ ] Normal, [ ] Gingivitis, [ ] Periodontitis
- Other finding:' where code = '00316C';
            UPDATE nhi_procedure SET description='Dx&Tx plan: Panoramic Finding (00317C)
- Missing:
- Impaction:
- 3rdMolar:
- Crown/Bridge/SSC:
- Pulpitis:
- RR:
- Caries:
- Periodontal status: [ ] Normal, [ ] Gingivitis, [ ] Periodontitis
- Other finding:' where code = '00317C';
